import React from 'react'; import './style/Nav.css'; const MainMenu = () => { // Fetch user information from local storage const loggedInUserData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('loggedInUser')); const handleLogout = () => { // Clear local storage and redirect to the login page localStorage.removeItem('loggedInUser'); localStorage.removeItem('isLoggedIn'); window.location.href = '/login'; // Redirect to the login page }; return (
